title: Paragraph
text: This is an additional paragraph slide. Discover the power of React, a JavaScript library for building user interfaces. Learn how React simplifies the development process with its component-based architecture and declarative syntax. title: Tailwind
text: Tailwind CSS is a utility-first CSS framework for rapidly building custom designs. It provides low-level utility classes that let you build completely custom designs without leaving your HTML. Learn more at https://tailwindcss.com/.

title: Bootstrap
text: Bootstrap is a popular front-end framework for developing responsive and mobile-first websites. It includes pre-designed components and a grid system to speed up development. Check out the documentation at https://getbootstrap.com/.

title: Difference
text: Tailwind CSS focuses on utility-first design, giving you the flexibility to create custom designs directly in your markup, while Bootstrap provides pre-designed components and a structured grid system for faster development. Choose the one that fits your project needs.
